title: Stuck level 4 honor for months
body:
So I usually get at least 1 honor every game and sometimes even 4 per game. My friends have been playing for less and they have Honor level 5.

How is this possible?

replies.body: You might have some games that haven't been the most honorable, and that could slow you down.  You haven't stopped, but you're not leveling at a rapid rate.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our PB team can offer more context.
Same problem i got honor 4 like 3 months ago i play active i get honors and i give honors.... My friend who trolls every game got 5. like wtf
